::Spears:;

"That's why I hate Preds so much.  I was one, a long time ago.
I was betrayed by my leader and left for dead." she breathed a deep 
sigh and looked at the old scars on her arm.
"Well, to cut a long story short, I changed sides and became a 
Maximal."
